import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import logo from '../../assets/author.png'; import { NavLink, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function Channel({ channelslug, onDataReceived }){ const [userInfo, setUserInfo] = useState([]); const location = useLocation(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const isHomePage = location.pathname === `/c/@${channelslug}`; const isVideoPage = location.pathname === `/c/@${channelslug}/videos`; const isAboutPage = location.pathname === `/c/@${channelslug}/about`; const mousewheel = () => { var container = document.querySelector('.sticky-buttons .links'); if(container){ container.addEventListener('wheel', function(e){ e.preventDefault(); container.scrollLeft += e.deltaY; }) } } mousewheel(); useEffect(() => { fetch(`http://localhost:8000/api/user_channel_json/${channelslug}`, { method: 'GET', credentials: 'include', }) .then(response => { if (response.status === 200) { return response.json(); } else { navigate('/'); throw new Error('Failed to fetch user info'); } }) .then(data => { setUserInfo(data); onDataReceived(data); }) .catch(error => { console.error('Error fetching user info:', error); }); }, [channelslug, navigate]) return ( <>

{userInfo.name ? userInfo.name : 'Loading...'}

@{userInfo.slug} {userInfo.subscribers} subscribers {userInfo.videoslength} videos
{userInfo.description}
youtube.com and more
{/*
*/} {/*
*/}
  • {isHomePage ? ( ):( )}
  • {isVideoPage ? ( ):( )}
    • {userInfo.subscribers >= 1000 ? (
    • ):( <> )}
  • {isAboutPage ? ( ):( )}
) }
